model_details.Tranception_L_no_retrieval: Tranception Large model (700M params) without retrieval
model_details.Tranception_M_no_retrieval: Tranception Medium model (300M params) without retrieval
model_details.Tranception_S_no_retrieval: Tranception Small model (85M params) without retrieval
model_details.Tranception_S: Tranception Small model (85M params) with retrieval
model_details.Tranception_M: Tranception Medium model (300M params) with retrieval
model_details.Tranception_L: Tranception Large model (700M params) with retrieval
model_details.TranceptEVE_S: TranceptEVE Small model (Tranception Small & retrieved EVE model)
model_details.TranceptEVE_M: TranceptEVE Medium model (Tranception Medium & retrieved EVE model)
model_details.TranceptEVE_L: TranceptEVE Large model (Tranception Large & retrieved EVE model)
